user2.author: Mark Hay, Amy Rose Spiegel
user2.title: I Have Tourette's and He's on the Autism Spectrum. Here's How We Have Sex
user2.description: "We take showers together. We touch. We kiss. We sleep together. We hold each other. We meow like cats."
user2.content: When people with neurodevelopmental disorders that affect their social communication capabilitieslike Paul and Grace, an older couple who, respectively, have Aspergers syndrome, an autism spectrum diâ€¦ [+9057 chars]
